UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: New antimicrobial activity for the catecholamine release-inhibitory peptide from chromogranin A.
Literature.Author: Briolat J, Wu SD, Mahata SK, Gonthier B, Bagnard D, Chasserot-Golaz S, Helle KB, Aunis D, Metz-Boutigue MH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli D22(MIC=40µM),Neurospora crassa CBS 327-54(MIC=5µM),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=80µM)
